member.name: T:Autofac.Integration.Mef.LazyWithMetadataRegistrationSource
member.summary: Support the types automatically whenever type T is registered with the container. Metadata values come from the component registration's metadata. When a dependency of a lazy type is used, the instantiation of the underlying component will be delayed until the Value property is first accessed.
